sys_ui_page.html:
About Script Speed Tester
The application aims at measuring how long does the particular script execute. It also has the ability to compare the speed of up to 9 scripts. The tool is useful for optimising the run time of scripts when using them in ServiceNow.
Create a test definition in$[SP]x_1397355_s_speed_test_definition$[SP]table. Put in your scripts (make sure you have proper cross-scope accesses!), set other details and run. Flow executes the scripts in background using the$[SP]GlideScopedEvaluator API. The test results are saved as$[SP]x_1397355_s_speed_test_result$[SP]records.

Roles:
x_1397355_s_speed.admin - application admin
x_1397355_s_speed.user - can read the test definitions, run tests and read results


Contributors
Natalia Kasper$[SP][LinkedIn]
Niko Sääski$[SP][LinkedIn]


Original speed test libraries - credits to$[SP]Jakub
